channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 07:43 Air Alarm to Poltava Oblast Watch Further Messages.

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Dniprovskyi district-Sinelnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
